title: Ticket #1205: admin manual's intro to virtual machines (3.15) ignores KVM
description: Since kvm is a 3rd type of virtual machine software supported, it should at least be mentioned along with Xen and VMWare in the intro to virtual machines, section 3.15
remarks: While fixing this detail, also edited all of section 3.15 to clarify details (after discussion with Jaime about these details).
check_ins: 2010-Mar-11 11:10   Check-in [25369]: Lotsa small edits to clarify vm universe setup, and satisfy gittrac #1205 (By Karen Miller )
creator: smoler
